basic_info.name: Siddharth Institute of Engineering & Technology FAQs

faqs.question: What is the application procedure at SIETK, Puttur?
faqs.answer: Ans.Candidates can apply to the college through online mode on the official website of the college by filling the application form by providing the required details of the candidates and paying the application fee for the same.

faqs.question: What is the fee structure for B.Tech. and M.Tech. courses at SIETK, Puttur?
faqs.answer: Ans.The fee structure for B.Tech. courses is INR 43000 per annum and fee structure for M.Tech. course is INR 57000 per annum.

faqs.question: What are the facilities provided by SIETK, Puttur?
faqs.answer: Ans.SIETK, Puttur has state of the art infrastructure which provides various facilities to the students such as modern classroom, well stocked library, laboratories, computer lab, hostel facilities, cafeteria and many more.Check:SIETK Puttur Hostel

faqs.question: How many seats are available for Polytehnic at SIETK, Puttur?

Section.name: About SIETK
Section.description:
Siddharth Institute of Engineering & Technology (SIETK), Puttur is an autonomous college established in 2001, affiliated to Jawaharlal Nehru Technological University and approved by UGC, AICTE, and NBA. The college offers 25+ UG, PG and diploma courses in the discipline of Technology and Management. Most popular courses of the SIETK are a 3 year B. Tech in several specializations, a 2 year M. Tech in 5 specializations and an MBA. Apart from that, the institute also offers an MCA degree program and Polytechnic courses in 5 specializations. To take admission in the B.Tech course, candidates need to obtain a valid score in EAMCET whereas candidates seeking enrollment in the M.Tech course need to appear for GATE. For admission in MBA and MCA programs, candidates need to appear in the ICET.
The college has a dedicated Training & Placement Cell who provides placement assistance to its students through campus recruitment. Some of the top recruiters are HP, IBM, Infosys, Tech Mahindra, Unitech, Wipro, Accenture, Capgemini, Cognizant, HCL, Eureka Forbes, HGS, Hitachi, and many more. Campus infrastructure include library, canteen, gallery, well equipped laboratories, sports facilities, etc. Siddharth Institute of Engineering & Technology also offers transport facilities.

Ques. What is the application procedure at SIETK, Puttur?
Ans. Candidates can apply to the college through online mode on the official website of the college by filling the application form by providing the required details of the candidates and paying the application fee for the same.
Ques. What is the fee structure for B.Tech. and M.Tech. courses at SIETK, Puttur?
Ans. The fee structure for B.Tech. courses is INR 43000 per annum and fee structure for M.Tech. course is INR 57000 per annum.
Ques. What are the facilities provided by SIETK, Puttur?
Ans. SIETK, Puttur has state of the art infrastructure which provides various facilities to the students such as modern classroom, well stocked library, laboratories, computer lab, hostel facilities, cafeteria and many more.
